attributes.action: Maximum payout from the National Lottery £3million pounds.
attributes.additional_details:
How many times do we read of multi million pound prizewinners lives being blighted because of too much money?  
By capping the first prize others with winning numbers, would share a bigger prize fund.
Having a payout of about £30 to £50 for three numbers must be welcomed.
 I believe that charity begins at home.
I would much prefer UK good causes, like young people, the elderly or injured military personnel being helped, rather than Ethiopian Spice Girls or Chinchilla breeding in Peru.
attributes.background:
I think winning £3 million would alter, for the better, 99.9% of peoples lives. All prize money shared out weekly.
Good causes supported in UK only.
No more Ethiopian Spice Girls.

rejection.details:
This is an operational decision for Camelot Group, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/203285
